channel.title: TravelgateX Documentation – Distribution
channel.description: Recent changes in Distribution on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Distribution: Overview
item.description:
In this documentation we will describe what the App Distribution is, what it does and also what it doesn’t do! Distribution: it’s a rules engine Distribution is a rules engine for the distribution of hotel products. The main rules that this solution offers are grouped into: Pricing Rules The main potential of Distribution lies in the versatility when it comes to defining complex rules to define the sales price. The different rules are calculated to obtain a percentage to be applied to the purchase price: it is not possible to define a fixed amount (fee).
[...]

item.title: Distribution: Extranet
item.description: <a href="/distribution/extranet/overview/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-info-circle"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Overview</h3> <p>Extranet rules Overview</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/distribution/extranet/agencies/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-list"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Agencies</h3> <p>Learn to manage the basic entities of Distribution-X</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/distribution/extranet/rules/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-puzzle-piece"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Rules managment</h3> <p>Manage princing rules, filters and blacklists</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/distribution/extranet/booking-search/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-search"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Booking Panel</h3> <p>Panel that allows you to check your reservations and its details</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/distribution/extranet/tools/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-wrench"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Tools</h3> <p>Tools that will help you manage your Distribution-X loaded data</p> </div> </div> </a>
